name: Swisscom AutoID services
overview:
Swisscom AutoID Services offers its customers innovative, scalable, comprehensive Auto-ID solutions that include Radio Frequency Identification (RFID), barcode systems, Cellular Network (GSM) and systems based on other sensor technologies.

Thanks to state-of-the-art auto-ID methods, Swisscom Auto-ID Services AG can deliver superior solutions for optimizing supply chain, asset and life cycle management and many other applications. The offering of Swisscom AutoID Services consists in consulting, realization, operation & hosting and managed AutoID Platform
